text: Estrella de la Aurora Morente Carbonell, (born August 14, 1980 in Las Gabias, Granada, Andalusia) is a Spanish flamenco singer. She is the daughter of flamenco singer Enrique Morente and dancer Aurora Carbonell. She has performed with her father since age seven.http://www.esflamenco.com/bio/en10774.html She released her first album in 2001, Mi Cante Y Un Poema (My Songs and A Poem). This was followed the same year by Calle del Aire. It was well received by critics and flamenco fans. She released her third album, Mujeres (Women) in 2006, which her father produced. On December 14, 2001 she married bullfighter Javier Conde in Nuestra Señora de las Angustias basilica in Granada. They have two children, Curro (2002) and Estrella (2005). ==Discography== * Mi cante y un poema (2001)Mi cante y un poema (2001) liner notes in Spanish, with sung texts * Calle del Aire (2001)Calle del Aire (2001) liner notes in Spanish, without sung texts * Mujeres (2006), Mute Records * Casacueva y escenario (2007) (DVD) * Autorretrato (2012) * Amar En Paz (con la guitarra de Niño Josele) (2014) == Notes == ==Other websites== *Official Site * Category:People from Granada Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish singers
title: Estrella Morente
